info.description: A comprehensive fitness platform API for gym members and trainers
info.title: FitTrack+ API

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get personalized dashboard data based on user role
Get available quick actions based on user role and profile completion
Check if the API server is running
Get all plan templates with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new fitness plan template (Admin/Trainer only)
Assign a plan template to a specific user (Trainer/Admin only)
post.summary: Assign a plan to a user

get.description: Get all plans assigned by the current trainer/admin (Trainer/Admin only)
Get all active plan templates that members can browse and select
Get all plans assigned to the current user

post.description: Request to be assigned a specific plan (Members can request, but admin/trainer must approve)

get.description: Get a specific plan template by ID
Get the current user's complete profile

put.description: Update the current authenticated user's profile

get.description: Check if the current user's profile is complete
Get the current user's role-specific profile
Check profile completion percentage based on user role

post.description: Complete profile setup for new users
Complete profile setup based on user role (member, trainer, admin, physio)
Upload a profile image for the current user

physio_id.description: Can be null for training sessions

trainer_id.description: Can be null for physio sessions

profile.description: Relationships - these will be populated when we query the database

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
